page.title: 03BOSTON WEST SCHOOL CLASS 7
page.content: There are{thirty three children}in our class.{Eighteen girls and fifteen {boys.}Natalie,Melanie,two Rachels,Lorraine, two Emmas, Kym, Lisa, Claire, Sarah, Nicola, Zoe, Joanne, Keely, Rebecca, two Katies, Nick, John, Kevin, Julian, two Stuarts, Ian, Duncan, James, Richard, Steven, Simon, Sean, two Andrews.Our{teacher is Mr.Cartwright he is very kind.The smallest boy is 1.34m and weighs 30kg.The smallest girl is 1.25m and weighs 25kg.The tallest boy is 1.57m and weighs 45kg. The tallest girl is 1.59m and weighs 45kg.The average height of our class is 1.40m.The average weight in our class is 33kg.{All the children in our {class were born in 19.73 or 19.74.
